dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
**Please do not reply to this email** 
 

July 20th 2005

FROM:  BellSouth Internet Services

VIA:  Email

RE:  Notice of Subpoena 

We are writing to inform you that BellSouth has been served with a subpoena requiring disclosure of information related to your account with BellSouth Internet Services.  The subpoena was issued in an action entitled:

New Line Productions: ET AL
Case #: 1:05-cv-01441-ODE

Pending in:
United States District Court
Northern District of Georgia

The subpoena commands BellSouth to identify you as the subscriber using the IP address 67.35.122.253 on 2/20/2005 at 22:37:13 EST.

 

Representatives of the subpoenaing parties can be reached at:

Loeb & Loeb, LLP
10100 Santa Monica Blvd., Suite 200
Los Angles, CA 90067-4164
Telephone: (310) 282-2125

Please be advised that BellSouth Internet Services will respond to the subpoena on or before August 2nd 2005 at 9:00 AM unless we receive an order to quash the subpoena from the court or the matter has been otherwise resolved.  Please be aware that any communications with BellSouth Internet Services may also be discoverable.  

You may wish to consult an attorney for advice before you contact any party or make any decisions affecting this case.   Please contact party cited above to obtain a copy of the subpoena.  

 

 **Please do not reply to this email**
